General.Name: Helma Eigenheimbau AG
General.Description: HELMA Eigenheimbau Aktiengesellschaft, together with its subsidiaries, provides a range of building services in Germany. The company engages in the development, planning, sale, and construction management of turnkey detached and semi-detached houses. It involved in the development, planning, and sale of holiday houses and apartments. In addition, it builds detached, semi-detached, and terraced houses; and constructs multi-storey residential buildings; and energy self-sufficient terraced and multi-family houses. HELMA Eigenheimbau Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Lehrte, Germany.
